code: import{useTasks}from'../../../contexts/use-task';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Button}from'../../shared/buttons/button/Button';import{CloseIcon}from"../../shared/icons/CloseIcon";import css from'./card.module.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Card=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{getTaskById,updateTask}=useTasks();const{cardId}=useParams();const[task,setTask]=useState();const defaultValue='This task has no description.';useEffect(()=>{if(cardId){setTask(getTaskById(cardId));}},[cardId]);const navigateBack=()=>navigate(-1);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:css.card,children:[task&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:css.body,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"taskName",children:" \u041D\u0430\u0437\u0432\u0430\u043D\u0438\u0435 \u0437\u0430\u0434\u0430\u043D\u0438\u044F "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:css.name,name:"taskName",value:task.name,onChange:e=>setTask({...task,name:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"taskDescription",children:" \u041E\u043F\u0438\u0441\u0430\u043D\u0438\u0435 \u0437\u0430\u0434\u0430\u043D\u0438\u044F "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:css.description,name:"taskDescription",value:!task.description?defaultValue:task.description,onChange:e=>setTask({...task,description:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:css['button-close'],onClick:navigateBack,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CloseIcon,{})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:css.footer,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:css['button-save'],onClick:()=>{updateTask(task);navigateBack();},children:"Save Card"})})]});};
